√jakṣ1 'eat'

present: [2.] jakṣiti  jagdhi  ajakṣus  jakṣat   -- [1.] jakṣati etc.  

[perfect: jajakṣa  ajajakṣat  ajakṣīt  jakṣiṣyati  jakṣitā  ]

verbal: jagdhá V.+  jagdhum  jagdhvā́ AV.+  jagdhvā́ya  

[secondary: jājakṣ-  jijakṣiṣa-  jakṣaya-  ]

derivatives: jágdhi B.+  

A reduplicated form of √ghas. The present forms found later only in the bhāgavata- purāṇa.
